DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate Safety , Tolerability Brain Function 2 dose PF-0254920 Subjects Early Huntington 's Disease .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating The Safety , Tolerability And Brain Function Of 2 Doses Of PF-0254920 In Subjects With Early Huntington 's Disease
DOC.criteria: Must diagnosis Huntington 's Disease CAG repeat expansion equal great 39 Unified Huntington Disease Rating Scale ( UHDRS ) Total Motor Score equal great 5 less 60 UHDRS Total Functional Capacity equal great 9 Subjects evidence history severe acute chronic medical condition laboratory abnormality , significant neurological disorder HD . Treatment antipsychotic medication within 5 week enrollment
